com.loyauty.service
Class ServiceLocator

java.lang.Object
  com.loyauty.service.ServiceLocator

public class ServiceLocator
extends java.lang.Object

J2EE clients interact with service components which provide business services and persistence capabilities. This class offers a lookup interface for all services available in the system. TODO: JNDI lookup for remote services!

Author:
Muthanna
